publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3438.1 Mary Scanlon: Housing (Scotland) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3438) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, insert at end “but, in so doing, expresses opposition to the scheme for the provision of information about houses on the market in Part 3 of the Bill, which provides for a single seller survey.” Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
